recommendations: Tyler Schuett
Lead UX Designer at Riot Games
March 26, 2016, Tyler worked with Kelly in different groups

Kelly can pretty much do the impossible. If you had asked me a year ago if I’d leave Amazon and move to LA to work for a gaming company I knew nothing about, I would have said you’re crazy. I did many times, when she proposed the idea. She is persistent, intelligent, and a pleasure to work with. The Riot recruiting process is really tough. Mine took 8 months or more. It’s a marathon. During the entire process, Kelly felt and acted as not only an advocate for me but a friend I could call when I was feeling shaky about the whole process. She had my back and that made all the difference in the world. There were a number of reasons why I came to Riot Games, and  she was one of them. Having also worked with her as a hiring manager now, I can tell you that she’s a tremendous asset. There’s no one else I would rather have on my team.

Kirk Crookham
Principal Technical Client Manager at AppNexus
January 21, 2013, Kirk worked with Kelly in different groups

Kelly is by far the most thorough, knowledgeable technical recruiter that I've had the pleasure to work with.  It takes a unique person to fully understand the needs of the technical roles that we were hiring in our industry and Kelly consistently delivered the best talent out there.  Kelly quickly gained a full understanding of the open positions being hired and was always came through with candidates that met our needs.  Kelly is an invaluable asset to any organization in need of an HR Professional as she truly understands the needs of the technology industry and goes above and beyond what is asked of her.

summary: Full life-cycle recruiter with 15 years of experience.  Primarily responsible for senior level and hard to fill roles.  Utilizes unique sourcing strategies and out of the box thinking to engage with passive candidate for a stronger rate of response.  Directly engage with hiring managers to increase pipeline with the highest quality candidates and fill roles in the most efficient and timely manner.

title: Manager, Executive Recruiting at Activision Blizzard
